page.title: 13The Police
page.content: To join the Police Force you need 4 '0'levels including Maths and English, or you can take 5 short entrance exams. The main crime locally is stealing bicycles. The police recieve about 200 calls a week. There are 3 cells in the police station 1 female and 2 male. One of the male cells is especially for drunks. This cell has a bed 6ins off the ground. Inside the cell there is a toilet and a sink. The chain is outside the cell, the reason for this is so the prisoner can't do anything silly. The personal radios that the police use cost about Â£300 and on a good day can trasmit 5 miles.The aerial is 110 feet high. The traffic control car is a Ford Sierra and is equipped with road signs and first aid. It is called a jam sandwich because of the orange stripe along the white boby work.
